critique: The document is a formal request to reserve land for the Santee Sioux Indians. The language is formal and bureaucratic. There is a sense of concern for the well-being of the Santee Sioux Indians, but it is not expressed in a highly emotional way. Therefore, I will assign low scores for all emotions except for sadness, which I will assign a slightly higher score due to the displacement of the Santee Sioux Indians.
